snippet: Republican-led states leave many of their poorest citizens without health insurance.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican-led states that have rejected expansion of their Medicaid programs, effectively denying health insurance to millions of the country's poorest citizens; notes that Supreme Court decision that made Medicaid expansion optional for states made the states' rejection possible; urges all states to expand their Medicaid programs.
lead_paragraph: Republican-led states leave many of their poorest citizens without health insurance.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
